query.statement: SELECT 'U' AS FLAG, (A.ADJCOST * 100) AS ADJCOST, (A.ADMCOST1 * 100) AS ADMCOST1, (A.ADMCOST2 * 100) AS ADMCOST2, (A.AMOUNT * 100) AS AMOUNT, A.APDAT, A.ASTAT, A.BGUBN, (A.BIL_AMT * 100) AS BIL_AMT, (A.BILAMT1 * 100) AS BILAMT1, (A.BILAMT2 * 100) AS BILAMT2, (A.BILAMT3 * 100) AS BILAMT3, A.BILDAT, A.BILDAT2, A.BILDAT3, A.BILEND, A.BSU, SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(A.MANDT, A.LIFNR) AS BSUNM, A.BUSSI, A.CHANGE, A.CHDAT, A.CHGBN, A.CHTIM, A.CPRD, A.CRDAT, A.CRNAM, SAPHEE.GET_BOSU_INWON(A.MANDT, A.CRNAM) AS CRNAME, A.CRSN, A.CRTIM, A.CS001_GBN, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(#G_MANDT#, #G_LANG#, 'CS001_GBN', A.CS001_GBN) AS CS001_GBNNM, A.CST, A.CSTNM, A.DOC1, WB01.APSTAT AS DOC1STAT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(WB01.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '견적 승인 ' WHEN COALESCE(WB01.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '수주 등록 ' ELSE '' END || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'WBAP_STAT', WB01.APSTAT) AS DOC1STATNM, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_NEXT_SABUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC1) AS DOC1DEC, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC1, 'S') AS DOC1CURSEQ, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC1, 'S') AS DOC1MAXSEQ, WB021.APNUM AS DOC1DRA, --기안자 A.DOC2, WB02.APSTAT AS DOC2STAT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(WB02.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '수주 결재 ' WHEN COALESCE(WB02.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '수주 승인 ' ELSE '' END || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'WBAP_STAT', WB02.APSTAT) AS DOC2STATNM, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_NEXT_SABUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC2) AS DOC2DEC, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC2, 'S') AS DOC2CURSEQ, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC2, 'S') AS DOC2MAXSEQ, A.DOC3, WB03.APSTAT AS DOC3STAT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(WB03.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '재청구 결재 ' WHEN COALESCE(WB03.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '재청구 승인 ' ELSE '' END || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'WBAP_STAT', WB03.APSTAT) AS DOC3STATNM, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_NEXT_SABUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC3) AS DOC3DEC, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC3, 'S') AS DOC3CURSEQ, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC3, 'S') AS DOC3MAXSEQ, A.DOC4, WB04.APSTAT AS DOC4STAT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(WB04.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '변경 기안 ' WHEN COALESCE(WB04.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '변경 수신 ' ELSE '' END || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'WBAP_STAT', WB04.APSTAT) AS DOC4STATNM, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_NEXT_SABUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC4) AS DOC4DEC, CASE WHEN WB04.APSTAT <= '3' THEN SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC4, 'S') ELSE SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC4, 'R') END AS DOC4CURSEQ, CASE WHEN WB04.APSTAT <= '3' THEN SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC4, 'S') ELSE SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC4, 'R') END AS DOC4MAXSEQ, A.DOC5, WB05.APSTAT AS DOC5STAT, CASE WHEN COALESCE(WB05.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '취소 기안 ' WHEN COALESCE(WB05.APSTAT, -1) BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN '취소 수신 ' ELSE '' END || SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'WBAP_STAT', WB05.APSTAT) AS DOC5STATNM, SAPHEE.GET_EWF_NEXT_SABUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC5) AS DOC5DEC, CASE WHEN WB05.APSTAT <= '3' THEN SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC5, 'S') ELSE SAPHEE.GET_EWF_CURR_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC5, 'R') END AS DOC5CURSEQ, CASE WHEN WB05.APSTAT <= '3' THEN SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC5, 'S') ELSE SAPHEE.GET_EWF_LAST_SUNBUN(A.MANDT, A.DOC5, 'R') END AS DOC5MAXSEQ, A.ERNAM, A.EXP_PCT, (A.EXPENSE1 * 100) AS EXPENSE1, (A.EXPENSE2 * 100) AS EXPENSE2, FAILYN, (A.HIS_DIRSUM * 100) AS HIS_DIRSUM, (A.HIS_INDSUM * 100) AS HIS_INDSUM, (A.HIS_LABOR * 100) AS HIS_LABOR, (A.HIS_LCOST * 100) AS HIS_LCOST, (A.HIS_LOG * 100) AS HIS_LOG, (A.HIS_OEM * 100) AS HIS_OEM, A.HIS_RATE, (A.HIS_TOTCOST * 100) AS HIS_TOTCOST, (A.HIS_UCOST * 100) AS HIS_UCOST, A.ID_RATE, A.JOBEND, A.KUNNR, A.KVGR1, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'KVGR1', A.KVGR1) AS KVGR1NM, A.KVGR2, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'KVGR2', A.KVGR2) AS KVGR2NM, (SELECT STATUS FROM SAPHEE.ZCST005 WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND PSPID = A.PS_PSPID) AS LABSTAT, --수주상태(인건비지급여부 확인용) (A.LCOST_OFR * 100) AS LCOST_OFR, (A.LCOST_STD * 100) AS LCOST_STD, A.LIFNR, A.MA_PSPID, A.MANDT, A.MNG_PCT, A.NETWR, (A.NETWR_DC * 100) AS NETWR_DC, (A.NETWR_OFR * 100) AS NETWR_OFR, (A.NETWR_STD * 100) AS NETWR_STD, A.NIGHT_WGT, A.PERNR, A.PGBN, A.PNAME, A.PRDAT, A.PRO_PCT, A.PRTIM, A.PS_PSPID, A.QTAPDAT, A.QSTAT, A.QTDAT, A.QTNAM, A.QTNUM, A.QTNUM2, B.RATE, --견적 작성 당시의 임율(정확히는 최초자재 저장시의 임율) A.REMARK, A.REQKIND, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(#G_MANDT#, #G_LANG#, '3', A.REQKIND) AS REQKINDNM, A.REQNR, (A.REVENUE1 * 100) AS REVENUE1, (A.REVENUE2 * 100) AS REVENUE2, A.RSTAT, A.RTEXT, A.SEQ, CASE WHEN (A.SEQ = '0') THEN '원본' ELSE A.SEQ || '차' END AS SEQNM, A.SH_ADDR, A.SH_TYP, A.SHDAT, A.SOAPDAT, A.SOCADAT, A.SOCHDAT, A.SODAT, A.BUSSI || '0' AS SPART, -- SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'SPART', A.BUSSI || '0') AS SPARTNM, A.BUSSI || '0' AS SPARTNM, A.SPT, (A.SUM_AMT * 100) AS SUM_AMT, (A.SUM_OFR * 100) AS SUM_OFR, (A.SUM_STD * 100) AS SUM_STD, A.SUR_RATE, (A.SURCHARGE * 100) AS SURCHARGE, A.TAXK1, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'TAXK1', A.TAXK1) AS TAXK1NM, A.UPN, A.VBELN, A.VBTYP, A.VKBUR, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'VKBUR', A.VKBUR) AS VKBURNM, A.VKGRP, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'VKGRP', A.VKGRP) AS VKGRPNM, A.WAERS, A.WEEKEND_WGT, A.WERKS, A.ZTERM, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV('183', 'ko', 'ZTERM', A.ZTERM) AS ZTERMNM, A.ENDYN, (SELECT CASE WHEN VALUE(MAX(CODE2),'N') = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'PAY_ST' AND CODE2 = A.PS_PSPID) AS PAYSTAT, -- 인건비지급여부 확인용(예외 케이스 적용) CASE WHEN VALUE(MM124.BOMNUM,'') > '' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END BOMYN, MM001.RDATE AS RDATE, MM031.REQNR AS REQNR2, VALUE(WB02.FNAM,'') AS FNAME FROM (SELECT AMT * 100 AS RATE FROM SAPHEE.ZCST002G WHERE QTNUM = #QTNUM# AND SEQ = #SEQ# AND MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SEQNO = (SELECT MIN(SEQNO) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST002G WHERE QTNUM = #QTNUM# AND SEQ = #SEQ# AND MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) ) AS B, SAPHEE.ZCST001G AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB01 -- 견적 ON A.DOC1 = WB01.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB01.MANDT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB02 -- 수주 ON A.DOC2 = WB02.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB02.MANDT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB03 -- 재청구 ON A.DOC3 = WB03.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB03.MANDT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB04 -- 수주변경 ON A.DOC4 = WB04.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB04.MANDT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 WB05 -- 수주취소 ON A.DOC5 = WB05.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB05.MANDT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 WB021 -- 견적기안자 ON A.DOC1 = WB021.DOCNO AND A.MANDT = WB021.MANDT AND WB021.SEQNO = '1' -- 1차 결재자가 견적기안자임(이동진SA확인/20150209) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT124 MM124 -- BOM 대상 ON A.MANDT = MM124.MANDT AND A.QTNUM = MM124.BOMNUM AND MM124.GUBUN = 'A' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT031 MM031 ON A.MANDT = MM031.MANDT AND A.QTNUM = MM031.QTNUM AND A.SEQ = MM031.SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT001 MM001 ON A.MANDT = MM001.MANDT AND MM001.REQNR = MM031.REQNR AND MM001.REQITEM = '00010' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.QTNUM = #QTNUM# AND A.SEQ = #SEQ# FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY WITH UR
